page.title: 03Farming
page.content: This part of Norfolk is mainly {farmland,}growing cereals,sugar beet and oil seed rape. In one part of the block there are{pheasants}reared in woodland. The{fields}are very large, many over 10 acres and the hedges around the fields have been removed in many cases to enlarge the amount of productive land,and to facilitate use of very large{machinery.}This has caused soil erosion by strong winds at certain times of the year.This erosion would be worse but for the few small patches of old woodland that remain. Heavy use of herbicides and pesticides has reduced the natural flora and fauna considerably for the last 20 years.
